segments.text: I see two children engaged in some serious cookie-related mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is climbing on a two-step stool, precariously balanced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up into an open upper cabinet, where a cookie jar sits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep inside the jar, undoubtedly retrieving a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm slightly worried it might tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, her arm outstretched, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the stool, but her posture suggests she's an accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together in this delightful little conspiracy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s quite charming to watch their coordinated effort for a sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The "COOKIE JAR" label is perfectly visible, adding to the classic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
